title: MY ACCOUNT GOT HACKED AND THE HACKER USED ALL MY IP
body: i was playing a normal game and at the end i was shown a notification saying my account was logged in from another location and then lol closed. When i relogined i had 85 of my hard-earned 3235 IP. I rushed to the purchase history and saw that i had somehow bought Olaf for 3150 IP and a skin for him for free(Glacial Olaf). Please Riot help me do something.Maybe anyone has any advice of what to do?

replies.body:
To get this sorted, you'll need to reach out to our account specialists by [submitting a support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions~
